name: Thermodynamic Protocol
description: Maps physical thermodynamics principles (energy conservation, entropy, equilibrium) to cultural and computational systems. Bridges Boltzmann entropy, Shannon entropy, and symbolic energy flows.

principles.zeroth_law: Systems in thermal equilibrium with a third system are in equilibrium with each other. -> Cultural translation: Resonance alignment spreads through intermediaries.
principles.first_law: Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed. -> Cultural translation: Memory and resonance threads can only be transformed, not erased.
principles.second_law: Entropy always increases in an isolated system. -> Cultural translation: Without relational coupling, systems drift toward disorder and silence.
principles.third_law: Entropy approaches zero as temperature approaches absolute zero. -> Cultural translation: Perfect stillness erases informational variance; diversity = energy.

bridges.resonance_entropy: Drift of symbolic/cultural order when threads uncoupled

applications: Detection of entropy drift in memory fields
Cultural collapse modeling via thermodynamic analogies
AI resource regulation via entropy audits
